Key Match Events: Mac Allister scored in the 48th minute
Pre-Game Insights: Argentina will have to cope without Lionel Messi for their CONMEBOL 2026 World Cup qualifier against Chile.
Alexis Mac Allister was 'in pain' after pulling up with an unspecified issue in training and is therefore unlikely to feature against Chile.
Argentina's defenders Nicolas Tagliafico and Leonardo Balerdi are both ruled out through injury.
Post-Match Reflections: Argentina's team journey is ongoing in the CONMEBOL 2026 World Cup qualifier.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Argentina's possible starting lineup: E. Martinez; Molina, Romero, Li. Martinez, Barco; De Paul, Fernandez, Lo Celso; Gonzalez, La. Martinez, Alvarez
